meanings.definition: A plant of the nightshade family with brightly colored funnel-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The salpiglossis in the garden has vibrant petals.
meanings.sent2: I planted a salpiglossis in my backyard for its beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the salpiglossis, enjoying its colorful blooms.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a salpiglossis in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The salpiglossis stood out in the field like a rainbow on a cloudy day.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the salpiglossis belongs.
meanings.sent1: Many different flowers belong to the salpiglossis genus.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the characteristics of the salpiglossis genus.
meanings.sent3: In the plant kingdom, the salpiglossis genus is quite popular.
meanings.sent4: The diversity within the salpiglossis genus is astounding.
meanings.sent5: Each member of the salpiglossis genus has its unique charm.
